description.0: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

0.0: HP is increased by <cryo>16%</cryo>. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

1.0: HP is increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by <cryo>25%</cryo>. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

2.0: HP is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo>. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by <cryo>30%</cryo>. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

3.0: HP is increased by <cryo>28%</cryo>. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by <cryo>35%</cryo>. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

4.0: HP is increased by <cryo>32%</cryo>. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by <cryo>40%</cryo>. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.
